augments.name: Ace in the Hole
augments.desc: Gain an Ace Emblem, a Draven, a Miss Fortune, and a Samira.

augments.name: AFK
augments.desc: You cannot perform actions for the next 3 rounds. Afterwards, gain 20 gold.

augments.name: Ancient Archives II
augments.desc: Gain 2 Tome of Traits and 3 gold.

augments.name: Ascension
augments.desc: After 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 50% more damage.

augments.name: Axiom Arc I
augments.desc: Your units gain 25 Mana on kill.

augments.name: Axiom Arc II
augments.desc: Your units gain 30 Mana on kill.

augments.name: Band of Thieves II
augments.desc: Gain 2 Thief's Gloves.

augments.name: Band of Thieves I
augments.desc: Gain 1 Thief's Gloves.

augments.name: Battlemage I
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 15 Armor and 15 Ability Power.

augments.name: Battlemage II
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 25 Armor and 25 Ability Power.

augments.name: BattlemageIII
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 35 Armor and 35 Ability Power.

augments.name: Better Together
augments.desc: Aura items that buff your team have their effects increased by 33%. Gain a Locket of the Iron Solari

augments.name: Big Friend I
augments.desc: Your units that start combat next to a unit with over 1600 Health take 9% less damage for the rest of combat.

augments.name: Big Friend II
augments.desc: Your units that start combat next to a unit with over 1600 Health take 10% less damage for the rest of combat.

augments.name: Binary Airdrop
augments.desc: Your champions equipped with 2 items temporarily gain a random completed item at the start of combat. Gain @ItemComponents@ random item components.

augments.name: Birthday Present
augments.desc: Gain a 2-star champion and 2 gold every time you level up. The champion's tier is your level minus 4 (min: Tier 1).

augments.name: Blue Battery I
augments.desc: After casting their Ability, your units restore 10 Mana.

augments.name: Blue Battery II
augments.desc: After casting their Ability, your units restore 20 Mana.

augments.name: Calculated Loss
augments.desc: After losing your combat, gain 2 gold and a free Shop refresh.

augments.name: Celestial Blessing I
augments.desc: Your units heal for 10% of the damage dealt by attacks and Abilities. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 200 Health.

augments.name: Celestial Blessing II
augments.desc: Your units heal for 15% of the damage dealt by attacks and Abilities. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 300 Health.

augments.name: Celestial Blessing III
augments.desc: Your units heal for 25% of the damage dealt by attacks and Abilities. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 400 Health.

augments.name: Clear Mind
augments.desc: If you have no champions on your bench at the end of player combat round, gain 3 experience points.

augments.name: Cluttered Mind
augments.desc: If your bench is full at the end of player combat round, gain 3 experience points. Gain 4 random Tier 1 champions.

augments.name: Combat Training
augments.desc: Your Champions permanently gain 1 Attack Damage every time they kill an enemy unit. Champions start with 8% Attack Damage.

augments.name: Component Grab Bag
augments.desc: Gain 3 random item components.

augments.name: Consistency
augments.desc: Gain double win and loss streak gold.

augments.name: Cruel Pact
augments.desc: Buying XP costs 5 Health instead of gold. Heal 2 Health before each player combat.

augments.name: Cursed Crown
augments.desc: Gain +2 maximum team size, but take 100% increased player damage.

augments.name: Cybernetic Implants I
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 80 Health and 10% Attack Damage.

augments.name: Cybernetic Implants II
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 120 Health and 20% Attack Damage.

augments.name: Cybernetic Implants III
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 200 Health and 30% Attack Damage.

augments.name: Cybernetic Shell I
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 80 Health and 30 Armor.

augments.name: Cybernetic Shell II
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 120 Health and 40 Armor.

augments.name: Cybernetic Shell III
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 200 Health and 60 Armor.

augments.name: Cybernetic Uplink I
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 80 Health and restore 2 Mana per second.

augments.name: Cybernetic Uplink II
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 120 Health and restore 2.5 Mana per second.

augments.name: Cybernetic Uplink III
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 200 Health and restore 3.5 Mana per second.

augments.name: Disintegrator I
augments.desc: Your units' attacks deal bonus magic damage equal to 2% of the target's maximum Health.

augments.name: Disintegrator II
augments.desc: Your units' attacks deal bonus magic damage equal to 3% of the target's maximum Health.

augments.name: Disintegrator III
augments.desc: Your units' attacks deal bonus magic damage equal to 4% of the target's maximum Health.

augments.name: Exiles I
augments.desc: Your units that start combat with no adajacent allies gain a 25% maximum Health shield for 10 seconds.

augments.name: Exiles II
augments.desc: Your units that start combat with no adajacent allies gain a 35% maximum Health shield for 10 seconds.

augments.name: Exiles III
augments.desc: Your units that start combat with no adajacent allies gain a 50% maximum Health shield for 10 seconds.

augments.name: Stand United I
augments.desc: Your units gain 1.5% Attack Damage and 1.5 Ability Power per Trait active across your army.

augments.name: Stand United II
augments.desc: Your units gain 2 Attack Damage and 3 Ability Power per Trait active across your army.

augments.name: Stand United III
augments.desc: Your units gain 3 Attack Damage and Ability Power per Trait active across your army.

augments.name: Electrocharge I
augments.desc: When your units receive critical strikes, they deal 30-90 (based on current Stage) magic damage to nearby enemies. (1 second cooldown).

augments.name: Electrocharge II
augments.desc: When your units receive critical strikes, they deal 50-110 (based on current Stage) magic damage to nearby enemies. (1 second cooldown).

augments.name: Electrocharge III
augments.desc: When your units receive critical strikes, they deal 100-205 (based on current Stage) magic damage to nearby enemies. (1 second cooldown).

augments.name: Featherweights I
augments.desc: Your 1 and 2 cost champions gain 20% Attack Speed and Move Speed.

augments.name: Featherweights II
augments.desc: Your 1 and 2 cost champions gain 30% Attack Speed and Move Speed.

augments.name: Featherweights III
augments.desc: Your 1 and 2 cost units gain 50% Attack Speed and Move Speed.

augments.name: First Aid Kit
augments.desc: All healing and shielding on your units is increased by 25%.

augments.name: First Aid Kit II
augments.desc: All healing and shielding on your units is increased by 35%.

augments.name: Future Sight I
augments.desc: Know who you will fight next. Gain a Zephyr.

augments.name: Future Sight II
augments.desc: Know who you fight next. Gain a Radiant Zephyr.

augments.name: Gadget Expert
augments.desc: Direct Damage items deal 25% more damage as true damage. Gain a Statikk Shiv.

augments.name: Golden Ticket
augments.desc: Each time your Shop is refreshed, you have a 50% chance to gain a free refresh.

augments.name: High Roller
augments.desc: Gain 3 Loaded Dice and 3 gold.

augments.name: High End Shopping
augments.desc: Champions appear in your Shop as if you were 1 level higher. Gain 3 gold.

augments.name: Hustler
augments.desc: Instead of having no interest, you get 3 golds at the beginning of player combat rounds.

augments.name: Item Grab Bag I
augments.desc: Gain 1 random completed item.

augments.name: Item Grab Bag II
augments.desc: Gain 2 random completed items and 2 Reforgers.

augments.name: Jeweled Lotus II
augments.desc: Your units' Abilities can critically strike. Your units gain 15% Critical Strike chance.

augments.name: Knife's Edge I
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 15 Attack Damage.

augments.name: Knife's Edge II
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 25 Attack Damage.

augments.name: Knife's Edge III
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the first 2 rows gain 55% Attack Damage.

augments.name: Last Stand
augments.desc: The first time you would be eliminated or reduced to 1 Health, instead remain alive. After this effect triggers, your units permanently gain 180 Health, 18 Armor and Magic Resist, and 18% Omnivamp.

augments.name: Lategame Specialist
augments.desc: When you reach Level 9, gain 44 gold.

augments.name: Living Forge
augments.desc: Gain an Ornn Item Anvil now and after every 10 player combats.

augments.name: Living Forge
augments.desc: Gain an Ornn Item Anvil now and after every 10 player combats.

augments.name: Lucky Gloves
augments.desc: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 3 Sparring Gloves.

augments.name: Luden's Echo I
augments.desc: When your units cast and deal Ability damage, the first target hit and a nearby enemy take 35-80 (based on current Stage) magic damage.

augments.name: Luden's Echo II
augments.desc: When your units cast and deal Ability damage, the first target hit and a nearby enemy take 50-110 (based on current Stage) magic damage.

augments.name: Luden's Echo III
augments.desc: When your units cast and deal Ability damage, the first target hit and a nearby enemy take 90-210 (based on current Stage) magic damage.

augments.name: Makeshift Armor I
augments.desc: Your units with no items gain 30 Armor and Magic Resist.

augments.name: Makeshift Armor II
augments.desc: Your units with no items gain 45 Armor and Magic Resist.

augments.name: Makeshift Armor III
augments.desc: Your units with no items gain 65 Armor and Magic Resist.

augments.name: Level Up!
augments.desc: When you buy XP, gain an additional 3. Gain 2 immediately. You can now reach level 10.

augments.name: Metabolic Accelerator
augments.desc: Your Tactician moves faster and heals 2 Health after a PvP round.

augments.name: New Recruit
augments.desc: Gain +1 maximum team size.

augments.name: Pandora's Bench
augments.desc: Gain 2 gold. At the start of every round, champions on the 3 rightmost bench slots transform into random champions of the same cost.

augments.name: Pandora's Items
augments.desc: Gain a random component. Round Start: items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown, Spatula, and consumables).

augments.name: Portable Forge
augments.desc: Open an Armory and choose 1 of 2 unique Artifacts crafted by Ornn.

augments.name: Preparation I
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 25 Health, 3% Attack Damage and 3 Ability Power every round. Champions start with I stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

augments.name: Preparation I
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 35, 4 Attack Damage and Ability Power every round, up to 3 times.

augments.name: Preparation II
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 35 Health, 4% Attack Damage and 4 Ability Power every round. Champions start with I stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

augments.name: Preparation II
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 50, 6 Attack Damage and Ability Power every round, up to 3 times.

augments.name: Preparation III
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 50 Health, 7% Attack Damage and 7 Ability Power every round. Champions start with I stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

augments.name: Preparation III
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 70, 9% Attack Damage and Ability Power every round, up to 3 times.

augments.name: Radiant Relics
augments.desc: Open an Armory and choose 1 of 5 unique Radiant items.

augments.name: Recombobulator
augments.desc: Champions on your board permanently transform into random champions 1 Tier higher. Gain @NumRemovers@ Magnetic Removers.

augments.name: Rich Get Richer
augments.desc: Gain 12 gold. Your maximum interest is increased to 7.

augments.name: Rich Get Richer+
augments.desc: Gain 18 gold. Your maximum interest is increased to 7.

augments.name: Salvage Bin
augments.desc: Gain a random completed item now, and a component after @NumRounds@ player combats. Selling champions breaks apart their full items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).

augments.name: Salvage Bin+
augments.desc: Gain a random completed item now, and a component after @NumRounds@ player combats. Selling champions breaks apart their full items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).

augments.name: Scoped Weapons
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the back 2 rows gain +2 Attack Range and 15% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Scoped Weapons II
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the back 2 rows gain infinite Attack Range.

augments.name: Second Wind I
augments.desc: After 10 seconds of combat, your units heal 40% of their missing Health.

augments.name: Second Wind II
augments.desc: After 10 seconds of combat, your units heal 60% of their missing Health.

augments.name: March of Progress
augments.desc: Gain 3 XP now, and bonus XP equal to your level at the start of every player combat round. You can no longer use gold to level up.

augments.name: Sunfire Board
augments.desc: At the start of combat, burn all enemies for 10% of their maximum Health over 20 seconds and reduce healing received by 33%.

augments.name: Phony Frontline
augments.desc: Gain 2 Target Dummies.

augments.name: The Golden Egg
augments.desc: Gain a massive golden egg that hatches in 11 turns. Victorious player combats accelerate the hatch timer by an additional turn.

augments.name: The Golden Egg
augments.desc: Gain a massive golden egg that hatches in 11 turns. If you won vs player, receive bonus turn.

augments.name: Think Fast
augments.desc: Shop refreshes are free until the end of this round. Traits and other augments do not benefit from these free shops. Gain 3 gold.

augments.name: Three's Company
augments.desc: Gain 4 random Tier 3 champions.

augments.name: Wise Spending
augments.desc: Gain 2 experience points when you refresh your Shop.

augments.name: Thrill of the Hunt I
augments.desc: Your units heal 350 Health on kill.

augments.name: Thrill of the Hunt II
augments.desc: Your units heal 550 Health on kill.

augments.name: Tiny Titans
augments.desc: Your Tactician heals 30 Health, grows larger, and has 130 maximum Health.

augments.name: Ancient Archives I
augments.desc: Gain 1 Tome of Traits and 5 gold.

augments.name: Trade Sector
augments.desc: Gain a free Shop refresh each round.

augments.name: Trade Sector+
augments.desc: Gain a free Shop refresh each round. Gain 10 golds.

augments.name: Built Different I
augments.desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 200-300 Health and 25-55% Attack Speed. (based on current Stage)

augments.name: Built Different II
augments.desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 200-425 Health and 40-60% Attack Speed (based on current Stage).

augments.name: Built Different III
augments.desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 270-600 Health and 50-70% Attack Speed (based on current Stage).

augments.name: Tri Force I
augments.desc: Your Tier 3 champions gain 75 Health, 10 starting Mana, and 10% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Tri Force II
augments.desc: Your Tier 3 champions gain 125 Health, 15 starting Mana, and 15% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Tri Force III
augments.desc: Your Tier 3 champions gain 200 Health, 25 starting Mana, and 25% Attack Speed.

augments.name: True Twos
augments.desc: Gain 1 random 2-star Tier 1 champions and 1 random 2-star Tier 2 champion.

augments.name: Double Trouble I
augments.desc: If you have exactly 2 copies of a champion on your board, they both gain 25 Attack Damage, Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

augments.name: Double Trouble II
augments.desc: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 33% Attack Damage and 33 Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

augments.name: Double Trouble III
augments.desc: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 44% Attack Damage and 44 Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

augments.name: Urf's Grab Bag I
augments.desc: Gain 1 Spatula and 1 random item component.

augments.name: Urf's Grab Bag II
augments.desc: Gain 1 Spatula and 3 random item components.

augments.name: Verdant Veil
augments.desc: Your units are immune to crowd control effects for the first 20 seconds of combat. Gains 15% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Windfall
augments.desc: Gain 20 gold.

augments.name: Windfall+
augments.desc: Gain 35 gold.

augments.name: Windfall++
augments.desc: Gain 40 gold.

augments.name: Woodland Charm
augments.desc: Your highest Health champion is cloned. Clones cannot hold items.

augments.name: Silver Ticket
augments.desc: Each time your Shop is refreshed, you have a 30% chance to gain a free refresh.

augments.name: Young and Wild and Free
augments.desc: You can always move freely on Carousel rounds. Gain a random component.

augments.name: Cybernetic Bulk II
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 350 health.

augments.name: Phreaky Friday
augments.desc: Gain an Infinity Force. After 5 Player combats, gain a second Infinity Force.

augments.name: Cybernetic Bulk I
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 250 health.

augments.name: Capricious Forge
augments.desc: Gain a Blacksmith's Gloves, which equips two temporary Ornn Artifacts each round.

augments.name: Cybernetic Bulk III
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 500 health.

augments.name: Starter Kit
augments.desc: Gain a Tier 4 champion, and a 2-star Tier 1 champion that shares a trait with them. At the next 1 stages, gain the Tier 4 champion again.

augments.name: Cybernetic Leech I
augments.desc: Your units holding an item gain 80 Health and 13% Omnivamp.

augments.name: Cybernetic Leech II
augments.desc: Your units holding an item gain 120 Health and 18% Omnivamp.

augments.name: Latent Forge
augments.desc: Gain an Ornn Item Anvil after 8 player combats.

augments.name: Cybernetic Leech III
augments.desc: Your units holding an item gain 225 Health and 25% Omnivamp.

augments.name: Unified Resistance II
augments.desc: If you have 3 or more units in the same row at the start of combat, they all gain 30 Armor and Magic Resist.

augments.name: Tons of Stats!
augments.desc: Your team gains 35 Health, 5% Attack Damage, 5 Ability Power, 5 Armor, 5 Magic Resist, 5% Attack Speed, and 5 Mana.

augments.name: Unified Resistance I
augments.desc: If you have 3 or more units in the same row at the start of combat, they all gain 18 Armor and Magic Resist.

augments.name: Silver Spoon
augments.desc: Gain 10 XP.

augments.name: Tactician's Tools
augments.desc: Gain two Spatulas.

augments.name: Component Buffet
augments.desc: Gain a random component. Whenever you would get a random component, instead gain a component anvil.

augments.name: Inconsistency
augments.desc: If your streak is less than 2, gain 2 gold.

augments.name: Iron Assets
augments.desc: Gain a Component Anvil and 2 Gold.

augments.name: On a Roll
augments.desc: Whenever you star-up a champion, gain a free reroll. Gain 2 gold.

augments.name: Stars are Born
augments.desc: The first tier 1 unit and tier 2 unit you buy are upgraded to 2-star. Gain a 3 gold.

augments.name: Scrappy Inventions
augments.desc: At the start of combat, maximum of 5 components on your champions turn into  temporary items for the rest of combat. At the start of the next 2 stages, gain a component.

augments.name: Library Card
augments.desc: Gain a Tome of Traits and a Component Anvil

augments.name: Social Distancing I
augments.desc: Units that begin combat with no adjacent allies gain 12% Attack Damage and Ability Power.

augments.name: Social Distancing II
augments.desc: Units that begin combat with no adjacent allies gain 18% Attack Damage and Ability Power.

augments.name: Social Distancing III
augments.desc: Units that begin combat with no adjacent allies gain 25% Attack Damage and Ability Power.

augments.name: One Twos Three
augments.desc: Gain 1 Tier one unit, 2 Tier two units, and 1 Tier three unit.

augments.name: Endurance Training
augments.desc: Your champions permanently gain 18 Health every time they kill an enemy. Champions start with 100 bonus Health.

augments.name: Early Education
augments.desc: Your champions permanently gain 1 Ability Power whenever they kill an enemy. Champions start with 15 bonus Ability Power.

augments.name: Indomitable Will
augments.desc: When your units score a Takedown they shed all negative effects and become immune to Crowd Control for 10 seconds.

augments.name: Final Reserves
augments.desc: The first time you would be eliminated or reduced to 1 Health, instead remain alive. After this effect triggers, at the beginning of your next planning phase gain 80 XP and 40 Gold.

augments.name: All That Shimmers
augments.desc: Gain a Shimmerscale Item armory that offers 3 options. Shimmerscale items aid gold generation.

augments.name: Shoplifting
augments.desc: After your first shop refresh each turn, gain the highest cost champion for free.

augments.name: Spectral Supplies
augments.desc: At the start of combat, distribute 4 temporary completed items to the champions with the fewest items.

augments.name: Missed Connections
augments.desc: Gain a copy of each Tier One champion.

augments.name: Infusion
augments.desc: Your team restores 20 Mana every 5 seconds.

augments.name: Roll The Dice
augments.desc: Gain a Radiant Thieves Gloves.

augments.name: What The Forge
augments.desc: All Completed items you own or receive are reforged into random Ornn Artifacts (excluding Tactician's Crown and Emblems). Units gain 160 Health per equipped Artifact.

augments.name: Sleight of Hand
augments.desc: Gain a Thiefs Gloves. Your allies holding Thiefs Gloves gain 30% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Blood Money
augments.desc: Gain 1 gold per 3 Health your Tactician loses.

augments.name: A Cut Above
augments.desc: Gain a Deathblade. Champions with Deathblade have a 33% chance to drop 1 gold on kill.

augments.name: Mana Burn
augments.desc: Gain a Shroud of Stillness. All enemies take 2% of their maximum health as true damage each second until the first time they cast their spell. No longer damages units without mana.

augments.name: Idealism
augments.desc: Gain a Hand of Justice. Champions with a Hand of Justice deal 13% increased damage.

augments.name: Healing Orbs I
augments.desc: When an enemy dies, the nearest allied unit is healed for 300.

augments.name: Healing Orbs II
augments.desc: When an enemy dies, the nearest allied unit is healed for 500.

augments.name: Gargantuan Resolve
augments.desc: Gain a Titan's Resolve. Your Titan's Resolves can continue stacking to 35 instead of 25.

augments.name: Gifts from the Fallen
augments.desc: Your units gain 4% Attack Damage, 4 Ability Power, 4 Armor, and 4 Magic Resist. When one of your units dies, all your units gain these stats again.

augments.name: Hedge Fund
augments.desc: You have no interest cap. Gain 22 gold.

augments.name: Hedge Fund+
augments.desc: You have no interest cap. Gain 32 gold.

augments.name: Martyr
augments.desc: Whenever one of your units dies, all allies heal for 10% of Maximum health

augments.name: Long Distance Pals II
augments.desc: Combat start: Your two furthest champions form a bond, sharing 25% of their Armor, Magic Resist, Attack Damage, and Ability Power with each other.

augments.name: Demacia Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Demacia Emblem, a Recurve Bow, and a Garen.

augments.name: Demacia Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Demacia. Gain a Galio.

augments.name: Freljord Soul
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Freljord. Gain an Archangel's Staff and a Lissandra.

augments.name: Freljord Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Freljord. Gain an Ashe.

augments.name: Demacia Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Demacia Emblem and a Galio.

augments.name: Ionia Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Ionia Emblem and a Sett.

augments.name: Ionia Crown
augments.desc: Gain an Ionia Emblem, a Guardbreaker, and a Karma.

augments.name: Ionia Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Ionia. Gain a Sett.

augments.name: Noxus Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Noxus Emblem and a Swain.

augments.name: Noxus Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Noxus Emblem, a Sparring Gloves, and a Darius.

augments.name: Noxus Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Noxus. Gain a Swain.

augments.name: Piltover Soul
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Piltover. Gain a Giant Slayer and a Jayce.

augments.name: Piltover Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Piltover. Gain a Vi.

augments.name: Shadow Isles Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Shadow Isles. Gain a Viego and 1 gold.

augments.name: Shurima Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Shurima Emblem and a Taliyah.

augments.name: Shurima Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Shurima Emblem, a Protector’s Vow, and a Akshan.

augments.name: Shurima Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Shurima. Gain a Taliyah.

augments.name: Targon Soul
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Targon. Gain a Redemption and a Taric.

augments.name: Targon Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Targon. Gain a Soraka.

augments.name: Void Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Void Emblem, Zz'Rot Portal and a Rek'Sai.

augments.name: Void Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Void Emblem, Kassadin.

augments.name: Zaun Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Zaun Emblem and a Warwick.

augments.name: Zaun Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Zaun Emblem, a Guardbreaker, and an Ekko.

augments.name: Zaun Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Zaun. Gain a Warwick.

augments.name: Juggernaut Crest
augments.desc: Gain an Juggernaut Emblem and a Sett.

augments.name: Juggernaut Crown
augments.desc: Gain an Juggernaut Emblem, a Bloodthirster, and a Darius.

augments.name: Juggernaut Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Juggernaut. Gain a Sett.

augments.name: Bastion Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Bastion Emblem and a Kassadin.

augments.name: Bastion Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Bastion Emblem,  a Sunfire Cape, and a Taric.

augments.name: Bastion Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Bastion. Gain a Kassadin.

augments.name: Bruiser Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Bruiser Emblem and a Vi.

augments.name: Bruiser Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Bruiser Emblem, a Redemption, and a Rek'Sai.

augments.name: Bruiser Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Bruiser. Gain a Vi.

augments.name: Challenger Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Challenger Emblem and a Warwick.

augments.name: Challenger Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Challenger Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Kalista.

augments.name: Challenger Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Challenger. Gain a Warwick.

augments.name: Deadeye Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Deadeye Emblem and an Ashe.

augments.name: Deadeye Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Deadeye Emblem, a Guinsoo's Rageblade, and an Akshan.

augments.name: Deadeye Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Deadeye. Gain an Ashe.

augments.name: Multicaster Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Multicaster. Gain a Taliyah.

augments.name: Multicaster Soul
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Multicaster. Gain a Jeweled Gauntlet and a Vel'Koz.

augments.name: Invoker Crest
augments.desc: Gain an Invoker Emblem and a Soraka.

augments.name: Invoker Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Invoker Emblem, a Jeweled Gauntlet, and a Karma.

augments.name: Invoker Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Invoker. Gain a Soraka.

augments.name: Rogue Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Rogue Emblem and a Zed.

augments.name: Rogue Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Rogue Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Katarina.

augments.name: Rogue Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Rogue. Gain a Zed.

augments.name: Slayer Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Slayer Emblem and a Kled.

augments.name: Slayer Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Slayer Emblem, a Titan’s Resolve, and a Kled.

augments.name: Slayer Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Slayer. Gain a Kled.

augments.name: Sorcerer Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Sorcerer Emblem and a Swain.

augments.name: Sorcerer Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Sorcerer Emblem, a Spear of Shojin, and a Vel'Koz.

augments.name: Sorcerer Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Sorcerer. Gain a Swain.

augments.name: Strategist Soul
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Strategist. Gain a Chalice of Power and a Swain.

augments.name: Strategist Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Strategist. Gain a Swain.

augments.name: Gunner Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Gunner Emblem and a Jinx.

augments.name: Gunner Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Gunner Emblem, a Runann's Hurricane, and a Jayce.

augments.name: Gunner Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Gunner. Gain a Jinx.

augments.name: Contagion
augments.desc: Combat Start: Infect the highest health enemy, increasing their damage taken by 20%. Every 5 seconds or on death, the infection spreads to 2 nearby units.

augments.name: Jeweled Lotus III
augments.desc: Your units' Abilities can critically strike. Your units gain 45% Critical Strike chance.

augments.name: Jeweled Lotus I
augments.desc: Combat Start: Your strongest unit gains 40% critical strike chance and their spells can critically strike.

augments.name: Bronze Ticket
augments.desc: Every 4 Shop refreshes, gain a free refresh.

augments.name: Buried Treasures I
augments.desc: At the start of the next 2 rounds, gain a random item component.

augments.name: Buried Treasures II
augments.desc: At the start of the next 3 rounds, gain a random item component.

augments.name: Buried Treasures III
augments.desc: At the start of the next 5 rounds, gain a random item component.

augments.name: Branching Out
augments.desc: Gain a random Emblem and a Reforger.

augments.name: Know Your Enemy
augments.desc: Your units deal 12% increased damage. If you and your opponent have any of the same traits activated, they deal 20% increased damage instead.

augments.name: Endless Hordes
augments.desc: Gain +3 maximum team size, but your units can only hold 1 item and their total health is reduced by 20%. Gain 6 gold.

augments.name: Small Forge
augments.desc: Gain a Component Anvil and 4 Gold.

augments.name: Medium Forge
augments.desc: Gain a Completed Item Anvil and 7 Gold.

augments.name: Large Forge
augments.desc: Gain an Ornn Item Anvil and a Component Item Anvil.

augments.name: Job's Done
augments.desc: Gain 2 Component Anvils.

augments.name: Job Well Done
augments.desc: Gain a Completed Item Anvil and a Component Anvil.

augments.name: Masterful Job
augments.desc: Gain an Ornn Item Anvil and a Completed Item Anvil

augments.name: Harmacist I
augments.desc: Your units heal for 10% of the damage they deal, and they convert 20% of excess healing to true damage on their next attack.

augments.name: Harmacist II
augments.desc: Your units heal for 15% of the damage they deal, and they convert 25% of excess healing to true damage on their next attack.

augments.name: Harmacist III
augments.desc: Your units heal for 25% of the damage they deal, and they convert 30% of excess healing to true damage on their next attack.

augments.name: Knowledge Download 1+
augments.desc: Gain 20 XP.

augments.name: Knowledge Download II+
augments.desc: Gain 28 XP.

augments.name: Knowledge Download III+
augments.desc: Gain 40 XP.

augments.name: Knowledge Download I
augments.desc: Gain 12 XP.

augments.name: Knowledge Download II
augments.desc: Gain 22 XP.

augments.name: Knowledge Download III
augments.desc: Gain 36 XP.

augments.name: Pandora's Box
augments.desc: Gain a random Radiant item. Round Start: items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown, Spatula, and consumables).

augments.name: Pandora's Items II
augments.desc: Gain 2 random components. Round Start: items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown, Spatula, and consumables).

augments.name: What Doesn't Kill You
augments.desc: After losing your combat, gain 2 gold. Every 5 losses, gain a random component.

augments.name: Army Building
augments.desc: Gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator. This happens a second time after 7 player combats.

augments.name: Risky Moves
augments.desc: Your Tactician loses 20 Health, but after 7 Player combats, gain 30 Gold.

augments.name: Money Laundering
augments.desc: You earn no interest, but at the start of every player combat round gain 1 Gold per 2 units on your bench.

augments.name: Not Today
augments.desc: Gain an Edge of Night. Allies holding Edge of Night gain 35% Attack Speed.

augments.name: One, Two, Five!
augments.desc: Gain 1 random component, 2 Gold, and 1 random Tier 5 champion(s).

augments.name: Unburdened I
augments.desc: Your units without items equipped gain 30% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Unburdened II
augments.desc: Your units without items equipped gain 55% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Medium-End Shopping
augments.desc: Gain a 1 gold. Champions appear in the first 3 slots of your Shop as if you were 1 level higher.

augments.name: Petricite Shackles
augments.desc: Your Demacians deal 15% more damage, increased to 22% against Noxians and enemies with 100 or more maximum Mana. Gain 3 Demacians.

augments.name: Return on Investment
augments.desc: After you refresh your shop 20 times, gain a Tactician's Crown.

augments.name: Frequent Flier
augments.desc: After you refresh your shop 8 times, your refreshes cost 1 for the rest of the game.

augments.name: Missing Link
augments.desc: After you refresh your shop 40 times, gain a copy of each Tier 5 unit.

augments.name: Glacial Breeze
augments.desc: When your Freljordian Storm strikes, your units are shielded for 15% of their maximum Health and gain 8% Attack Speed. Gain 2 Freljord units.

augments.name: Balanced Budget
augments.desc: At the start of the next 4 rounds, Gain 4 Gold.

augments.name: Transfusion I
augments.desc: Your team gains 20 Health, plus 2 Health per missing Tactician Health.

augments.name: Balanced Budget II
augments.desc: At the start of the next 4 rounds, Gain 6 Gold.

augments.name: Transfusion II
augments.desc: Your team gains 40 Health, plus 3 Health per missing Tactician Health.

augments.name: Balanced Budget III
augments.desc: At the start of the next 4 rounds, Gain 11 Gold.

augments.name: Transfusion III
augments.desc: Your team gains 50 Health, plus 5 Health per missing Tactician Health.

augments.name: Spoils of War I
augments.desc: When you kill an enemy unit, there's a 20% chance to drop loot.

augments.name: Spoils of War II
augments.desc: When you kill an enemy unit, there's a 30% chance to drop loot.

augments.name: Spoils of War III
augments.desc: When you kill an enemy unit, there's a 40% chance to drop amazing loot.

augments.name: Money!
augments.desc: Gain 10 Gold. In 4 turns, gain 10 Gold again.

augments.name: Money Money!
augments.desc: Gain 16 Gold. In 4 turns, gain 16 Gold again.

augments.name: Money Money Money!
augments.desc: Gain 25 Gold. In 4 turns, gain 25 Gold again.

augments.name: Pumping Up I
augments.desc: Your units gain 8% Attack Speed. Each round, increase this by 0.5%.

augments.name: Haunted Shell
augments.desc: If Shadow Isles is active, your units gain 13 Armor and Magic Resistance for the rest of combat each time an ally dies. Gain 2 Shadow Isles units.

augments.name: Pumping Up II
augments.desc: Your units gain 10% Attack Speed. Each round, increase this by 1%.

augments.name: Pumping Up III
augments.desc: Your units gain 12% Attack Speed. Each round, increase this by 2%.

augments.name: Battle Ready
augments.desc: Your team deals 3% more damage and takes 3% less damage.

augments.name: Battle Ready II
augments.desc: Your team deals 6% more damage and takes 6% less damage.

augments.name: Battle Ready III
augments.desc: Your team deals 8% more damage and takes 8% less damage.

augments.name: Tiniest Titan
augments.desc: Your tactician is small and speedy, heals 2 Health after a PVP round, and grants 2 Gold per round.

augments.name: Gotta Go Fast!
augments.desc: Your team generates 10% more mana and moves 20% faster.

augments.name: Gotta Go Fast! II
augments.desc: Your team generates 25% more mana and moves 40% faster.

augments.name: Gotta Go Fast!!! III
augments.desc: Your team generates 35% more mana and moves 50% faster.

augments.name: Tiny Power I
augments.desc: Your units gain 7% Attack Damage, Ability Power, and Attack Speed.

augments.name: Final Grab Bag
augments.desc: Gain a random component, 10 gold, and a Reforger.

augments.name: Tiny Power II
augments.desc: Your units gains 10% Attack Damage, Ability Power, and Attack Speed.

augments.name: Tiny Power III
augments.desc: Your units gains 16% Attack Damage, Ability Power, and Attack Speed.

augments.name: Partial Ascension
augments.desc: After 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 30% more damage.

augments.name: Ascension
augments.desc: After 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 50% more damage.

augments.name: Final Ascension
augments.desc: Your units deal 15% more damage. After 15 seconds, this effect triples.

augments.name: Final Grab Bag II
augments.desc: Gain 2 random components, 12 gold, and a Magentic Remover.

augments.name: Urf's Grab Bag
augments.desc: Gain 2 random components, a Champion Duplicator, and a Spatula.

augments.name: Seeing Double I
augments.desc: Gain a random item made from 2 of the same component and 2 gold.

augments.name: Item Grab Bag II
augments.desc: Gain a random completed item, a random component, and 5 gold.

augments.name: Seeing Double II
augments.desc: Gain a random item made from 2 of the same component and 10 gold.

augments.name: Seeing Double III
augments.desc: Gain 2 random items made from 2 of the same component and 4 gold.

augments.name: Rolling For Days I
augments.desc: Gain 10 free shop refreshes. These shop refreshes carry over between rounds.

augments.name: Rolling For Days II
augments.desc: Gain 15 free shop refreshes, These shop refreshes carry over between rounds.

augments.name: Rolling For Days III
augments.desc: Gain 25 free shop refreshes, These shop refreshes carry over between rounds.

augments.name: Item Grab Bag III
augments.desc: Gain 2 random full items and 8 Gold.

augments.name: Tiny Grab Bag
augments.desc: Gain a random component, 4 gold, a Magnetic Remover.

augments.name: Big Grab Bag
augments.desc: Gain 2 random components, 8 gold, and a Reforger.

augments.name: Well-Earned Comforts I
augments.desc: Your units gain 60 Health for each item equipped.

augments.name: Giant Grab Bag
augments.desc: Gain 3 random components, 10 gold, and a Lesser Champion Duplicator.

augments.name: Well-Earned Comforts II
augments.desc: Your units gain 111 Health for each item equipped.

augments.name: Well-Earned Comforts III
augments.desc: Your units gain 120 Health and 8% Attack Speed for each item equipped.

augments.name: Training Reward
augments.desc: Gain 7 gold and a Lesser Champion Duplicator.

augments.name: Training Reward II
augments.desc: Gain 15 gold and a Lesser Champion Duplicator.

augments.name: Training Reward III
augments.desc: Gain 24 gold and a Champion Duplicator.

augments.name: It Pays To Learn
augments.desc: Gain 10 XP and 8 gold.

augments.name: It Pays to Learn II
augments.desc: Gain 16 XP and 12 gold.

augments.name: It Pays to Learn III
augments.desc: Gain 20 XP and 16 gold.

augments.name: Parting Gifts
augments.desc: When a unit dies, they pass a temporary copy of one of their items to the nearest ally with open slots and shield them for 40% of their maximum Health.

augments.name: Shurima's Legacy
augments.desc: Once assembled, your Sun Disc attacks enemies for 160-800 Magic Damage every 2 seconds (based on current Stage). Gain 3 Shurimans.

augments.name: Shadow Isles Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Shadow Isles Emblem, a Maokai, and 1 gold.

augments.name: Dueling Gunners
augments.desc: Your Gunner units gain 8% Attack Speed, plus 2% per Gunner stack. Gain 2 Gunners.

augments.name: Shadow Isles Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Shadow Isles Emblem, a Tear of the Goddess, and a Kalista.

augments.name: You Have My Sword
augments.desc: Gain a B.F. Sword. Your units gain 18% Attack Damage.

augments.name: You Have My Bow
augments.desc: Gain a Recurve Bow. Your units gain 15% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Magic Wand
augments.desc: Gain a Needlessly Large Rod. Your units gain 20% Ability Power.

augments.name: Escort Quest
augments.desc: Gain a Training Dummy. Each round, if it survives combat, gain 3 gold.

augments.name: Three's a Crowd
augments.desc: Your units gain 111 health for each Tier-3 unique unit you field.

augments.name: Two Healthy
augments.desc: Your units gain 111 health for each Tier-2 unique unit you field.

augments.name: The Boss
augments.desc: Gain a Sett. The first time your strongest Sett falls below 60% Health, he takes a break to do sit-ups. Each sit-up heals him 10% of his max Health and grants 45% Attack Speed and Ability Power.

augments.name: Wandering Trainer
augments.desc: Gain 4 gold and a Training Dummy. It has 3 random emblems equipped, which cannot be removed.

augments.name: Red Buff
augments.desc: Your units' attacks burn their targets for 8% of their maximum Health over 5 seconds and reduce their targets' healing received by 50%.

augments.name: Stellacorn's Blessing
augments.desc: While you have the Targon trait activated, your units gain 45% Attack Speed for 4 seconds after being healed or shielded. Gain 2 Targonians.

augments.name: Tactical Superiority
augments.desc: Your units gain 5% Attack Damage and Ability Power for each of their traits you have activated, doubled when you field a Strategist. Gain 2 Strategists.

augments.name: Overcharged Manafont
augments.desc: Combat Start: Your Sorcerer units gain 10 mana. The first time each Sorcerer gets a take down each combat, they gain 20 mana. Gain 2 Sorcerers.

augments.name: All Natural I
augments.desc: Your Champions with no items equipped gain 120 Health and heal for 1% of their max Health each second.

augments.name: All Natural II
augments.desc: Your units with no items equipped gain 150 Health and heal for 2% of their max Health each second.

augments.name: Wellness Trust
augments.desc: Round Start: Gain 3 gold. If you have at least 40 gold, your Tactician heals 2 Health.

augments.name: Ravenous Hunter
augments.desc: Gain a Warwick. When your strongest Warwick takes or deals damage, he gains 5% Attack Damage and 5 Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist, stacking up to 40 times.

augments.name: Patient Study
augments.desc: After player combat, gain 2 XP if you won or 3 XP if you lost. You can now reach Level 10.

augments.name: Riftwalk
augments.desc: Before casting, your strongest Kassadin gains 32 AP and blinks to the furthest enemy within 3 hexes, but his spell no longer disarms or shields. His mana cost is reduced by 30. Gain a Kassadin.

augments.name: Shimmering Inventors
augments.desc: Your Piltover units gain 7% Bonus Damage every 10 gold you have (Max: 40%), and have a 33% chance to drop 1 gold at round start. Gain an Ekko.

augments.name: Winds of War
augments.desc: Gain a Galio. Your strongest Galio's spell is larger, and enemies hit take magic damage equal to 8% of their max Health each second.

augments.name: Slayer's Resolve
augments.desc: When your Slayer units take or deal damage, they gain 2 Armor and Magic Resistance for the rest of combat (This can stack up to 25 times). Gain 2 Slayers.

augments.name: Demonflare
augments.desc: Gain a Swain. Your strongest Swain deals 4% increased damage per 100 max Health.

augments.name: Vampiric Blades
augments.desc: Your team gains 10% Omnivamp. Your Rogue units gain 20% instead. Gain 2 Rogues.

augments.name: Loving Invocation
augments.desc: Your team gains 2 Ability Power until the end of combat each time your Invoker units cast their Abilities. Gain 2 Invokers.

augments.name: Suppressing Fire
augments.desc: The target of your Deadeye units' shared attack is stunned for 8 seconds. Gain 2 Deadeyes.

augments.name: Perfected Repetition
augments.desc: Each time your Multicaster units deal ability damage, they gain 6%% Ability power (Max: 90%%) until the end of combat. Gain 2 Multicasters.

augments.name: Defensive Dash
augments.desc: Combat Start and on takedown: Your Challenger units gain a 75-225 health shield for 2.5 seconds (based on current Stage). Gain 2 Challenger units.

augments.name: Unstable Yordle Delivery
augments.desc: Round Start: Gain a random Yordle or 1-5 gold (based on current Stage). Gain 3 Yordles.

augments.name: Sentinel's Spirit
augments.desc: While in spirit form, your Ionia units gain 15% Attack Speed and shield themselves for 15% of their maximum Health. Gain 3 Ionians.

augments.name: Adrenaline Rush
augments.desc: Your Juggernaut units deal 10% extra damage, increased to 25% for the rest of combat when they fall below 50% Health.  Gain 2 Juggernauts.

augments.name: Morning Light
augments.desc: When your Bastion units drop below 50% Health, they heal for 40% of their maximum Health over 4 seconds. Gain 2 Bastion units.

augments.name: Stable Evolution
augments.desc: Your Void units gain 60 Health and 6% Attack Damage and Ability Power for each star level they have. Gain 3 Void units.

augments.name: Combat Caster
augments.desc: Your units gain a 90-170 (based on current Stage) health shield for 6 seconds after casting their spell.

augments.name: Titanic Strength
augments.desc: Bruisers gain % increased Attack Damage equal to 1.5% of their maximum Health. Gain 2 Bruisers.

augments.name: Blinding Speed
augments.desc: Gain a Rapid Firecannon and a Guinsoo's Rageblade, a Magnetic Remover.

augments.name: Impenetrable Bulwark
augments.desc: Gain a Bramble Vest and a Dragon's Claw, a Magnetic Remover.

augments.name: Unleashed Arcana
augments.desc: Gain a Jeweled Gauntlet and a Rabadon's Deathcap, a Magnetic Remover.

augments.name: Overwhelming Force
augments.desc: Gain a Deathblade and an Infinity Edge, a Magnetic Remover.

augments.name: Total Domination
augments.desc: Attacks and Abilities of your Noxus units execute enemies below 8% of their maximum Health, increased by +1% for each player you've Conquered. Gain 3 Noxians.

augments.name: Chemtech Enhancements
augments.desc: Your Chem Modded units gain 500 Health. Allies that start combat adjacent to them gain 100 Health. Gain 2 Zaun units.

augments.name: High End Sector
augments.desc: Gain 1 gold per round. When you level up, gain a number of free shop refreshes equal to your level.

augments.name: Caretaker's Ally
augments.desc: Each time you level up, gain the same random Tier 2 champion.

augments.name: Caretaker's Favor
augments.desc: Gain a component anvil when you reach level 5, 6, 7, and 8.

augments.name: Caretaker's Chosen
augments.desc: As you level, gain more powerful items. At level 4 - gain a Component Anvil, at level 6 - gain a Completed Item Anvil, at level 8 - open a radiant item armory.

augments.name: Latent Forge
augments.desc: Gain an Ornn Item Anvil after 8 player combats.

augments.name: Portable Forge
augments.desc: Open an Armory and choose 1 of 2 unique Artifacts crafted by Ornn.

augments.name: Living Forge
augments.desc: Gain an Ornn Item Anvil now and after every 10 player combats.

augments.name: AFK
augments.desc: You cannot perform actions for the next 3 rounds. Afterwards, gain 18 gold.

augments.name: Rich Get Richer
augments.desc: Gain 12 gold. Your maximum interest is increased to 7.

augments.name: Hedge Fund
augments.desc: You have no interest cap. Gain 16 gold.

augments.name: Jeweled Lotus III
augments.desc: Your units' Abilities can critically strike. Your units gain 45% Critical Strike chance.

augments.name: Jeweled Lotus II
augments.desc: Your units' Abilities can critically strike. Your units gain 10% Critical Strike chance.

augments.name: Jeweled Lotus I
augments.desc: Combat Start: Your strongest unit gains 25% critical strike chance and their spells can critically strike.

augments.name: Spoils of War I
augments.desc: When you kill an enemy unit, there's a 25% chance to drop loot.

augments.name: Spoils of War II
augments.desc: When you kill an enemy unit, there's a 30% chance to drop loot.

augments.name: Spoils of War III
augments.desc: When you kill an enemy unit, there's a 40% chance to drop amazing loot.

augments.name: Tiny Titans
augments.desc: Your Tactician heals 30 Health, grows larger, and has 130 maximum Health.

augments.name: Metabolic Accelerator
augments.desc: Your Tactician moves faster and heals 2 Health after a PvP round.

augments.name: Tiniest Titan
augments.desc: Your tactician is small and speedy, heals 2 Health after a PVP round, and grants 2 Gold per round.

augments.name: Branching Out
augments.desc: Gain a random Emblem and a Reforger.

augments.name: Ancient Archives I
augments.desc: Gain 1 Tome of Traits and 5 gold.

augments.name: Ancient Archives II
augments.desc: Gain 2 Tome of Traits and 3 gold.

augments.name: Cutting Corners
augments.desc: Leveling up costs 3 XP less. You can now reach Level 10.

augments.name: Patient Study
augments.desc: After player combat, gain 2 XP if you won or 3 XP if you lost. You can now reach Level 10.

augments.name: Level Up!
augments.desc: When you buy XP, gain an additional 3. Gain 4 immediately. You can now reach level 10.

augments.name: Pumping Up I
augments.desc: Your units gain 8% Attack Speed. Each round, increase this by 0.5%. (current Attack Speed: %)

augments.name: Pumping Up II
augments.desc: Your units gain 10% Attack Speed. Each round, increase this by 1%. (current Attack Speed: %)

augments.name: Pumping Up III
augments.desc: Your units gain 12% Attack Speed. Each round, increase this by 2%. (current Attack Speed: %)

augments.name: Buried Treasures I
augments.desc: Gain a random item component at the start of the next 2 rounds. Now starts granting items the round the augment is selected.

augments.name: Buried Treasures II
augments.desc: Gain a random item component at the start of the next 3 rounds. Now starts granting items the round the augment is selected.

augments.name: Buried Treasures III
augments.desc: Gain a random item component at the start of the next 5 rounds. Now starts granting items the round the augment is selected.

augments.name: Bronze Ticket
augments.desc: Every 4 Shop refreshes, gain a free refresh.

augments.name: Trade Sector
augments.desc: Gain a free Shop refresh each round. Gain a 2 gold.

augments.name: Shopping spree
augments.desc: Gain 1 gold per round. When you level up, gain a number of free shop refreshes equal to your level, which carry over your rounds.

augments.name: Transfusion I
augments.desc: Your team gains 20 Health, plus 2 Health per missing Tactician Health.

augments.name: Transfusion II
augments.desc: Your team gains 40 Health, plus 3 Health per missing Tactician Health.

augments.name: Transfusion III
augments.desc: Your team gains 50 Health, plus 5 Health per missing Tactician Health.

augments.name: Pandora's Items
augments.desc: Gain a random component. Round Start: items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown, Spatula, and consumables).

augments.name: Pandora's Items II
augments.desc: Gain 1 completed item. Round Start: items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown, Spatula, and consumables).

augments.name: Pandora's Box
augments.desc: Gain a random Radiant item. Round Start: items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown, Spatula, and consumables).

augments.name: Caretaker's Ally
augments.desc: Each time you level up, gain the same random Tier 2 champion.

augments.name: Caretaker's Favor
augments.desc: Gain a component anvil when you reach level 5, 6, 7, and 8.

augments.name: Caretaker's Chosen
augments.desc: As you level, gain more powerful items. At level 4 - gain a Component Anvil, at level 6 - gain a Completed Item Anvil, at level 7 - open a radiant item armory.

augments.name: One Twos Three
augments.desc: Gain 1 Tier one unit, 2 Tier two units, and 1 Tier three unit.

augments.name: Stars are Born
augments.desc: The first tier 1 unit and tier 2 unit you buy are upgraded to 2-star. Gain a 6 gold.

augments.name: Starter Kit
augments.desc: Gain a Tier 4 champion, and a 2-star Tier 2 champion that shares a trait with them. At the next 1 stages, gain the Tier 4 champion again.

augments.name: Phreaky Friday+
augments.desc: Gain an Infinity Force. After 3 Player combats, gain a second Infinity Force.

augments.name: Infernal Contract
augments.desc: Your max level is 7. Gain 85 Gold.

augments.name: Cutting Corners
augments.desc: Leveling up costs 3 XP less. You can now reach Level 10.

augments.name: Dedication
augments.desc: The first time you field at least 4 distinct units of the same trait in a player combat, gain an Emblem for that trait.

augments.name: Hedge Fund++
augments.desc: You have no interest cap. Gain 44 gold.

augments.name: Endless Hordes+
augments.desc: Gain +3 maximum team size. Your units can only hold 1 item. Gain 12 gold.

augments.name: Portable Forge
augments.desc: Open an Armory and choose 1 of 3 unique Artifacts crafted by Ornn.

augments.name: Portable Forge
augments.desc: Open an Armory and choose 1 of 4 unique Artifacts crafted by Ornn.

augments.name: Legend Augment - Silver
augments.desc: To comply Riot Games' policy, selected Legend Augments will not be displayed. In stage 2-1, a silver-level legend augment was selected.
